alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Santa Clarita Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 01 at 12:49PM PST until March 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Strongest in the foothills. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Lake Casitas, Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 AM PST Thursday. For the Frost Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Santa Clarita Valley
